text: Just arrived in #Barbados. Looking forward to joining Prime Minister @miaamormottley in honouring the 6000 heroes who have been saving lives and livelihoods since the #COVID19 pandemic started. #ThanksHealthHeroes

The crisis in sharing health tools that led to millions of preventable deaths is important background for a #PandemicAccord, so that next time we understand the likelihood for nationalistic greed & act better to ensure life-saving tools are used fairly. Good piece, @yodifiji. https://t.co/sc94We5XAP

Good read from the @washingtonpost - 'there can be no compromising with this virus'. We must bring the #COVID19 transmission under control everywhere, especially in the places with low vaccination rates, to reduce the chances of a new destructive variant. https://t.co/ZlJ3IT1Dkx
